```{r Libraries, Fonts, Data}

library(tidyverse)
library(showtext)

tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2023, week = 4)
```

```{r}
survivalists <- tuesdata$survivalists
loadouts <- tuesdata$loadouts
episodes <- tuesdata$episodes
seasons <- tuesdata$seasons
```

```{r map of season locations}
seasonLoc <- seasons %>%
  arrange(location, season) %>%
  mutate(site = paste(location, country, sep = " - ")) %>%
  select(-c("version", "location", "country", "n_survivors", "date_drop_off")) %>%
  group_by(site, lat, lon, season) %>%
  summarise(seasons = str_c(season, collapse = ",")) %>%
  rowid_to_column() %>%
  select(-c("seasons"))

worldMap <- map_data("world")

mapLoc <- ggplot() +
  geom_map(data = worldMap, map = worldMap, aes(long, lat, map_id = region))
  
  
  
  
  
```
